slideshow.caption: Biederman Redevelopment Ventures will bring an unparalleled level of programming to Bay Park, the elevated greenspace connecting 81 Bay Street and 141 Bay Street. [Pictured: Bryant Park, New York City]

Pictured: Bryant Park, a highly amenitized public park in New York City that was developed by Biederman Redevelopment Ventures. Games, libraries, cultural entertainment, and more populate the space year-round.
Bay Park will enjoy year-round programming, and its versatile design allows for numerous performance venues for music, poetry, and more. [Pictured: Bryant Park, New York City]

Bay Park's programming will also include games that change with the seasons. BRV's previous venture enjoyed a healthy schedule of table tennis, yoga, bocce and more. [Pictured: Bryant Park, New York City]
Within the park, tenants seeking a respite from the workday may enjoy some light reading, courtesy of mobile library stations. [Pictured: Bryant Park, New York City]
Year-round programming means unique holiday installations and events at Bay Park. [Pictured: Bryant Park, New York City]

Bay Park Centre's dedication to health and wellness extends to the programming in Bay Park; Yoga will be just one of many great lifestyle choices available to office tenants. [Pictured: Bryant Park, New York City]
